title: The Billionaire's Baby SOS
description: Help Nanny Needed...Successful CEO Matt Patterson isn't called the Ice Man for nothing - he's built up his multibillion-dollar company through cool decision-making and a ruthless reputation. But now he has a new challenge to face - fatherhood!Finding himself guardian to gorgeous baby Bella, Matt's more comfortable in the boardroom than changing a diaper. Lucky, then, that social worker Claire Kincaid agrees to play temporary mom. Happy families might never have been in Matt's plans, but Claire and little Bella are opening his eyes to a life that money could never buy...
author: Susan Meier
